string.value: #b#p9270059##k, one of the most fashionable people in the city, is anxious to get trendy fashion item #b#t4000469##k faster than any others.
#b#p9270059##k has made up her mind not to go out in the city without a matching #b#t4000469##k to go with her new outfit. And she needs 50 of them to choose from. \n\n#t4000469# #r#c4000469#/50#k
She does look pretty with the scarf on her. Before long, there will be many people who will want to have one of those trandy scarfs.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 15,000 Able to proceed to 'My Scarfs are Stolen!' as next quest.
I look really bad without scarfs. They just bring out my style, don't you think? It's a must have item for fashion icons such as myself.
I cannot possibly present myself to the public when I'm not properly dressed. Will you be able to get #b50 #t4000469#s#k for me?
It would be utter humiliation to be without a must-have fashion item.
Well, I will just have to stay in the house when I don't have matching #b#t4000469##k to go with my new outfit.
Wow, don't I look gorgeous? Haha...I know I do!
It looks so good on me. Everybody will be jealous of my new style.
Remember, I need plenty of #b#t4000469#s#k to choose from.
